title: Self-directed language learning strategies in blended learning environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A personalized language education program for adult learners, emphasizing interaction through online discussions and peer assessments.

learning_goals: Establish a self-directed learning plan at least three times per week using online materials and tools in a blended learning environment
Enhance language fluency and feedback-providing skills through real-time online discussions and peer evaluation activities
Document self-reflection and learning outcomes through project-based assessment performance
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
